name: Meemi - Glass Effect v0.13
description:
Renders Meemi.com's sections translucid, simulating the glass effect. 50% translucid version.

The background is downloadable at http://ragnarokkr79.deviantart.com/#/d2umxmp
additional_info:
2010-09-14 - v0.1:
 - First version released
 
2010-09-15 - v0.11:
 - Added box-shadow property
 - Added color property to memes' static labels
 - File size optimized
 - Reduced the quantity of options to set (FireFox edition only)
 
2010-09-20 - v0.12:
 - Unified version for Firefox and Chrome/Chromium.
 - Notification toolbar now is fixed on the page. It has been resized and
   changed to be vertically oriented
 - Get bigger count when mouse hovers the notification icons
 - Sidebar, Fast Meme and Search Areas resized to obtain enough space for
   Notification toolbar
 - Undo Notification Area resized to solve the overlapping with Notification
   toolbar
 - All memes area now become brigther on mouse hover and surrounded by a yellow
   halo to enlight the currenty reading meme
 - Icons in memes and sidebar areas now are enlighted by a surrounding light
 - Text within memes now is aligned justified

 KNOWN LIMITS: Some flash ADV banner is still cutted at sidebar border.

2011-06-28 - v0.13:
 - Fixed some rules due to user interface changes
